attributes.action: Ban funding of the European Research Group with taxpayers' money
attributes.additional_details: The European Research Group is a lobbying organisation made up of right-wing Conservative MPs whose specific aim is to lobby for Brexit. This is an unacceptable use of taxpayers' money since slightly under 50% of voters in the Brexit referendum voted to remain in the EU. This group does not carry out true research, it is simply a lobbying organisation. Furthermore, as it has plotted to bring down the UK Prime Minister (Source: The Economist Magazine) and is currently implicitly threatening members of parliament for their votes on matters concerning Brexit (Source: The BBC) it is a threat to UK democracy and we should not be paying for it.
attributes.background: The European Research Group is a lobbying organisation for Brexit made up of right-wing Conservative MPs. It is funded with taxpayers' money.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for making decisions about MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. You can find out how to contact the Compliance Officer for IPSA here:

http://www.parliamentarycompliance.org.uk/makingacomplaint/Pages/default.aspx
